LocaleResource.Value: CAPTCHA is a program that can tell whether its user is a human or a computer. You've probably seen them — colorful images with distorted text at the bottom ofWeb registration forms. CAPTCHAs are used by many websites to prevent abuse from "bots" or automated programs usually written to generate spam. No computer programcan read distorted text as well as humans can, so bots cannot navigate sites protectedby CAPTCHAs. nopCommerce uses reCAPTCHA.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.Configuration.Settings.GeneralCommon.FullTextSettings.NoiseWords
LocaleResource.Value: 为了防止全文索引变得臃肿，Microsoft SQL Server具有一种机制，可以丢弃无助于搜索的常见词汇。 这些词被称为噪音词，或停止词。 噪音词在特定地区的噪音词文件中列出。 例如，在英语语言环境中， 诸如“a”，“and”，“is”和“the”的单词在英语噪音词文件中并且被遗漏在全文索引之外， 因为它们在经验上已知 对搜索毫无用处。 请联系您的SQL Server管理员以获取有关它的更多信息.
